conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: walls show height/thickness, multiple faces are visible, and the view is clearly angled/isometric with the ceiling removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion of walls with readable corners and interior volume; clean cutaway and stable projection. Minor simplification of wall detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall massing resembles the plan (cluster of bedrooms on right, larger space on left, central wet-area core), but several plan-specific elements are simplified/shifted. Balcony/terrace treatment is not clearly present as a distinct exterior room, and internal partitions/corridor geometry do not fully match the 2D layout.

interior_elements.notes: Beds are present as simplified blocks, but bathroom fixtures (bath, WC) and other key elements (linen/robes/storage details) are largely missing or not distinguishable; furniture is minimal.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean, readable render with consistent materials and no obvious mesh breakage. Openings/doorways are not clearly modeled, reducing interpretability of circulation and room boundaries.

detected_errors.description: Layout fidelity issues: balcony/exterior space is not clearly represented and several internal partitions/corridor relationships appear simplified or shifted versus the 2D plan.
Doors/openings are not clearly placed on correct walls; window placement is only partially indicated and cannot be verified against the plan.
Bathroom fixtures and other interior elements are missing or too abstract to confirm room identities beyond beds.

summary: A valid 3D cutaway conversion with solid volumetric modeling, but only moderate faithfulness to the 2D plan due to simplified/missing balcony and weakened partition/door fidelity.
